titles.title: Potomac River Protection Act of 2002
To prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from issuing or renewing certain national pollutant discharge elimination system permits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

term.name: Waste disposal in rivers, lakes, etc.

bill.summary: 10/3/2002--Introduced. Potomac River Protection Act - Establishes pollutant discharge limits for permits under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act that allow discharges into any portion of the Potomac River flowing on or through land under the jurisdiction of the National Park Service.
